Errprcode 0x80070001 

Requested URL http://apps.myserver.local:80/myapp/index.html
Physical Path C:\inetpub\apps 

Before I get into configuration details (see attachment): Has anybody ever had
IIS7 correctly working with Tomcat connector? whats the secret?

creator: gregor@familyfischer.net
text: Had support from Microsoft and it seems to be, that the error code above is ERROR_INVALID_FUNCTION being generated by the ISAPI filter. So, seems to be a bug, less a config error.

creator: Tim.Whittington@orionhealth.com
text: I've used the Tomcat Connector successfully on IIS 7 type servers (Vista, Windows 7 and Windows 2008) without issue.
